title: XDM Business Person Details
description: Captures B2B Person specific attributes. A B2B Person could be a contact/lead etc.

xdm:personStatus.title: Person Status
xdm:personStatus.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the Person.

xdm:personSource.title: Person Source
xdm:personSource.description: Source from where the information regarding the person was received.

xdm:personScore.title: Person Score
xdm:personScore.description: A Score generated for a person by the CRM system.

xdm:accountID.title: Contact Account id
xdm:accountID.description: ID of the account thatâ€™s the parent of this person.

xdm:isBlocked.title: Blocked Indicator
xdm:isBlocked.description: Indicator if the person is blocked or not.

xdm:blockedCause.title: Blocked Cause
xdm:blockedCause.description: Reason why the person is blocked.

xdm:marketingSuspendedCause.title: Marketing Suspended Cause
xdm:marketingSuspendedCause.description: Reason why the person is suspended for any marketing purposes.

xdm:isConverted.title: Converted Indicator
xdm:isConverted.description: Indicates whether the Lead was successfully converted or not.

xdm:convertedDate.title: Converted Date
xdm:convertedDate.description: Date of conversion if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedContactID.title: Converted Contact ID
xdm:convertedContactID.description: Contact Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:personOptInOut.title: Person Preferences
xdm:personOptInOut.description: Holds opt out values for different channels as selected by the person.
